name: Dark Catacombs
overview: A mixture of text adventure and RPG awaits us, full of screens, potions and a variety of monsters that will assail and confuse you. The story begins in a tavern night, where surrounded by bad company and alcohol, we end up accidentally stumbling into a cave and without any of our belongings. From there, we should try to find an exit and monitor each corner to avoid biting the dust at any time.
